resources.string:
Tavite Group of Education, Katni was established in the academic year 2005-2006 run by Society named Ayurved Vikas Parishad, Katni (M.P.) which is registered under Madhya Pradesh Society Registration Act , 1973 with Reg. No. J.J.745 dated 25/03/1992.The college is recognized by N.C.T.E, New Delhi and affilated to Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya, Jabalpur. The college strives to provide quality education ,dedicated to becoming a place where the pursuit and dissemination of knowledge is unequivocal, respect for human diginity is unequalled & innovation is the norm.
TAVITE aspires to foster excellence, in undergraduate, post graduate education and research. It seeks to create , an enriched, more prosperous and sustainable society for the citizens of India and the World. The rapid changes taking place in the Higher/Technical Education throughout the world are taken into account while offering students greater accessibility and choice in the curriculum and course contents.
